root.response_template: Welcome to Card Services! You can ask about activating your card, rewards, or freezing your card.

activate_card_faq.response_template: To activate your card, please visit our mobile app or call the number on the back of your card.

rewards_faq.response_template: You earn 2 points for every dollar spent on groceries and 1 point elsewhere. Check your balance in the 'Rewards' tab.

freeze_faq.response_template: If you've misplaced your card, you can freeze it instantly in the app to prevent unauthorized charges.

out_of_scope.response_template: I'm sorry, I couldn't understand that. Could you please rephrase your request about your card?
